title: The Voyage of Charles Darwin Radio Times Vol 221 no 2868 1978.pd
description:
An article from the Radio Times magazine, which describes the marvellous series "The Voyage of Charles Darwin" in 1978. 

The last paragraph is most interesting in the light of crazy creationists trying to deny children access to the truth of common descent. 

"The Book of Genesis is not a scientific explanation of how things happened, but an ancient Babylonian method, in a prescientific age, of using myths to explain profound religious truths such as the meaning of man and the doctrine of creation. How living beings evolved is the study of those who are best equipped to tell us."  Bishop Hugh Montefiore
